participant_abstract.sent: We discussed the final product and what needs to be modified to stay within the budget.
We then discussed how the product scored on each of my 7 criteria.

participant_actions.sent: Market person evaluates how the consumer responses to product and new fashion trends.
Industrial engineer can be alert to price drops.
Interface person can redesign product with current knowledge of materials and functionality.
Management can push senior management for more funding.

participant_decisions.sent: It was decided that the product will be made from plastic.
It was decided that the product would have a single curve instead of a double curve.
It was decided that the product would not have a locator for when it got lost.
We would lose the USB connection.
We would still have multiple languages* A fruity like colour would be used but this is a compromise*.

participant_problems.sent: It was too expensive to have the rubber sponge type body.
It was too expensive to have a double curved body.
It was too expensive to have a USB connection.
The product did not have a fruit like appearance.
